TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 154
TEI.2.document_title: William Cooper to Stephen F Austin, 12-26-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with William Cooper, December 26, 1828. Bill and price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 154

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with William Cooper, December 26, 1828. Bill and price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* With *person_mentioned*William Cooper*/person_mentioned*-----------Dr.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-xx-1828">January*/date_mentioned* $ cents*/p* *p*this 1828 To Two Bottles Whiskey By *person_mentioned*Singlet */person_mentioned*on-----------1.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-14-1828">Aprile 14*/date_mentioned* 4 lbs Sugar and 2 lbs Coffee------------------2. 00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="04-19-1828">19.*/date_mentioned* By *person_mentioned*L. R. Kinney*/person_mentioned* recd one gallon Whiskey----------2.00*/p* *p*3 lbs Coffee and 6 lbs Sugar---------------------3.00*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="05-05-1828">May 5*/date_mentioned* 2 Gallons Whiskey at $2 pe Gallon----------------4.00*/p* *p*2 qts Whiskey and 2 lbs Sugar *person_mentioned*W.Whiting*/person_mentioned*----------1.50*/p* *p*2 qts Whiskey and 2 lbs Sugar *person_mentioned*W.Whiting*/person_mentioned*----------1.50*/p* *p*13.50*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="09-22-1828">Sepr 22nd*/date_mentioned* for Order Brought by *person_mentioned*Indian*/person_mentioned*----------------------1.12 1/2*/p* *p*2 Quires letter paper----------------------------1.00*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="11-29-1828">Nov. 29*/date_mentioned* 2 Sheets Drawing Paper-----------------------------12*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="12-26-1828">Dec. 26*/date_mentioned* 1 quire do do ----------------1.00*/p* *p*16.75*/p* *p*Assumption for *person_mentioned*Leall*/person_mentioned*---------------------------------- 3.00*/p* *p*19. 75*/p*
*/div1*
